Address.label: Address
Address.value: 500 LAUREL STREET,SUITE 101, BATON ROUGE, Louisiana, 70801, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Business First Bancshares Inc is a United States-based bank holding company. The company's services include personal and commercial banking, treasury management, and wealth solutions. It provides a range of financial services to small-to-midsized businesses and professionals. The company generates most of its revenues from interest income on loans, customer service and loan fees, and interest income from securities.
